Component.label: Job Status
Component.Description: The Job Status component retrieves information about a scheduled job and its trigger instances.
Component.InputDescription: The unique identifier of a scheduled job instance, previously generated by a Schedule Job.
Component.OutputDescription: The unique identifier of a scheduled job instance
The group name of a scheduled job instance
The unique identifier of a n-th trigger instance
The group name of a n-th trigger instance
The next fire timestamp of a n-th trigger instance
The job's trigger instances unique identifiers
The job's trigger instances group names
The job's trigger instances next fire timestamps
Component.BeanDescription:
The component state object for the Job Status consists of the following property:

  • String instanceId: the job instance identifier
  • String group: the job instance group name
  • String description: the job description
  • int triggersSize: the job triggers count
  • String[] triggerInstanceIds: the array of trigger instances identifiers
  • String[] triggerGroups: the array of trigger instances group names
  • Timestamp[] triggerNextFireTimestamps: the array of trigger instances next fire timestamps
  • Map[] triggers: the array of triggers maps holding information about each trigger

The trigger map state object consists of the following property:

  • String instanceId: the trigger instance identifier
  • String group: the trigger instance group name
  • String description: the trigger description
  • Timestamp triggerNextFireTimestamps: the trigger next fire timestamp
